name: Raphaël
desc: Raphaël is a cross-browser JavaScript library that draws Vector graphics for web sites.It will use SVG for most browsers, but will use VML for older versions of Internet Explorer.

name: Relay
desc: A JavaScript framework for building data-driven React applications.It uses GraphQL as the query language to exchange data between app and server efficiently.Queries live next to the views that rely on them, so you can easily reasonabout your app. Relay aggregates queries into efficient network requests to fetch only what you need.

name: Three.js
desc: Three.js allows the creation of GPU-accelerated 3D animations usingthe JavaScript language as part of a website without relying onproprietary browser plugins. This is possible thanks to the advent of WebGL.
